text: Reisbach is a market town in Bavaria. It is on the Vils River, and belongs to the administrative region of Lower Bavaria. == Neighbouring communities == The neighbouring communities, listed clockwise, are Mamming, Landau an der Isar, Simbach (bei Landau), Falkenberg (Niederbayern), Rimbach (Niederbayern), Gangkofen, Marklkofen and Gottfrieding. ==Villages in the municipality== * Englmannsberg * Griesbach * Niederhausen * Oberhausen * Oberm√ºnchsdorf * Reith * Thannenmais ==References== Category:Dingolfing-Landau
title: Reisbach (Vils)
